ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Amendments effected by Resolution 86/XVIII adopted on 26 January 1995 by the Governing Council to articles 3.3, 3.4, 4.2, 4.5, 5.1, 6.2, 6.3, 6.5, 6.6, 12(a) and 13.3 and Scedules I, II and III of the Agreement establishing the International Fund for Agricultural Development
